promptExamples.label: Analysis Prompt
promptExamples.content:
Role: You are a highly experienced Sales Analyst with deep expertise in identifying trends and uncovering strategic growth opportunities from sales data.

Goal: Identify sales growth opportunities for Cadence Cycle Co. 

Context:
Cadence Cycle Co. is a manufacture of bicycle accessories. The attached spreadsheet contains their full order history, with the following columns:
- Order number
- Company ID
- Company Name
- Order Date
- Total Order Amount

Task: 
Analyze the data in the attached spreadsheet and answer this questions: Year-over-Year Growth: Of the customers that had revenue in 2024, identify the top 5 customers in terms of the highest year over-year-growth.

promptExamples.label: Research Prompt
promptExamples.content:
Role: You are a highly experienced Sales Analyst for Cadence Cycle Co., a manufacture of bicycle accessories. You specializing in researching high-profile executive research that drives sales strategy. 

Goal: Support the sales team in generating more revenue by providing customer research that will help with outreach.

Customer: David Progar, Senior Vice President of Merchandising at Dicks Sporting Goods

Suggested Sources:
- LinkedIn profile and posts
- SEC filings / earnings-call transcripts (past 8 quarters)
- Press releases (company + personal quotes)
- Major industry / trade publications
- Podcasts, YouTube interviews, webinars (use transcript snippets)
- Local business journals, conference agendas, award bios
- Any additional reputable source that adds color or confirms a point

Task: Conduct research on the customer above and create a customer profile with the following sections. Each section should be <100 words:
- Professional Background –a short summary of work history
- Current Strategic Priorities – a short summary of initiatives in the last 18 months
- Key Business Challenges / Pain Points
- Personal Interests & Hobbies – if available
- Communication Style & Preferences – inferred from interviews, social posts, or speaking gigs
- Outreach Recommendations: A short summary (<75 words) of key insights to guide personalized outreach. Include past business they have done.

Quality & Reliability:
- Be strategic. Don’t just list facts.
- Corroborate any critical fact with ≥ 2 sources when available.
- Flag contradictory information.
- Note confidence level (High / Medium / Low) at the end of each section.
- If certain details are unavailable, indicate that clearly.

promptExamples.label: Outreach Prompt
promptExamples.content:
Role: You are a seasoned marketing executive for Cadence Cycle Co., a manufacturer of bicycle accessories.

Goal: Craft three concise, high-impact sales outreach emails to secure a sales meeting with a high-level prospect, David Progar, Senior Vice President of Merchandising at Dicks Sporting Goods.

Context:
The purpose of the meeting is to:
- Understand the merchandising team’s current priorities.
- Explore how Cadence Cycle Co. can deepen its partnership with Dick’s Sporting Goods.
- Reference prior business between the two companies to establish credibility.

Task:
1. Review the “Outreach Recommendations” section below.
2. Write three short, distinct email drafts that:
    - Reflect Progar’s tone and communication style.
    - Connect to Dick’s strategic initiatives (e.g., youth sports, community engagement, in-store innovation).
    - Position Cadence as a strategic, collaborative partner.
    - End with a clear, low-friction call to action to meet.

Outreach Recommendations:
[Paste the Outreach Recommendations here]

instructionsPage.title: Instructions
instructions: 1) Analyse CRM data for customer growth opportunities.
a) Got to the 'CRM data' page.
b) Click on the cadence_sales_data link to download it. (NOTE: In reality, always remove any PII)
c) Open ChatGPT and select the Reasoning Model, 'o3',  (or the Data Analytics GPT)
d) Attache the spreadsheet you downloaded.
e) On the 'Prompt Examples' page, copy the 'Analysis Prompt', paste it into  ChatGPT and press enter.
a) Open ChatGPT and select the 'o3' model and 'Deep Research' option if you have them.
b) On the 'Prompt Examples' page, copy the 'Research Prompt', paste it ChatGPT, and press enter.
b) While you wait, move to step 3.
a) On the 'Prompt Examples' page, copy the 'Outreach Prompt', and paste it into a black doc.
b) When step 2 is complete, copy the Outreach Recommendations section and paste it into your black doc too.
c) Open ChatGPT and select the '4o' model.
d) Copy and paste your full prompt from your black doc to ChatGPT and press enter.
